table.caption: Table F. 8 – Thumbnail hint table, per-page entry
head: Item
Size (bits)
Description
rows: (Optional) The number of preceding pages lacking a thumbnail image. This number indicates how many pages without a thumbnail image lie between the previous entry’s page and this page.
A number that, when added to the least number of objects in a thumbnail image, gives the number of objects in this page’s thumbnail image.
A number that, when added to the least length of a thumbnail image, gives the length of this page’s thumbnail image in bytes.
